meanings.definition: A process of separating particles in a liquid by spinning them at high speeds in a centrifuge.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used ultracentrifugation to separate the tiny particles in the liquid.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician performed ultracentrifugation to analyze the components of the solution.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the ultracentrifugation machine went so fast that it made the particles dizzy!
meanings.sent4: The ultracentrifugation process acted like a tornado, swirling the particles apart.
meanings.sent5: The ultracentrifugation technique was like a magical whirlwind, revealing the hidden secrets of the liquid.

meanings.definition: The act of using a centrifuge to separate components of a mixture based on their density.
meanings.sent1: After adding the mixture to the centrifuge, the ultracentrifugation began to separate the components.
meanings.sent2: The scientist carefully monitored the ultracentrifugation process to ensure accurate separation of the mixture.
meanings.sent3: During the lab experiment, the ultracentrifugation made the components line up like soldiers!
meanings.sent4: The ultracentrifugation was like a skilled chef, delicately separating the ingredients based on their weight.
meanings.sent5: The ultracentrifugation procedure was like a gentle giant, sorting the components with precision and care.
